attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The time has come to pull our troops out of Afghanistan.  We must come up with a new way of combating the terrorist theat to this country.  We can longer leave our troops in a country whose president won a fraudulent election and where our soldiers are killed by the very people they are training.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
